name: The Rice Wash Skin-Softening Cleanser
about: What it is: A non-stripping cleanser that gently washes away daily buildup while replenishing moisture to reveal visibly softer, more luminous, clean skin...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, and Combination..Skincare Concerns: Dryness..Formulation: Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Hyaluronic Acid and Red Algae: Replenish moisture reserve for hydrated, plump skin..- Japanese Rice Powder: Gently cleanses while leaving skin petal-soft to the touch..- pH-Neutral Amino Acid Base: Removes dirt without stripping skin, leaving it silky and well-moisturized...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free, and gluten-free...What Else You Need to Know: This creamy foaming cleanser removes daily build-up of makeup, dirt, and oil while replenishing hydration. The amino acid-rich base maintains a healthy pH, visibly softening skin and boosting luminosity to reveal a lit-from-within glow...Clinical Results: In a study with 25 panelists, evaluated via self-assessment:.-96% agreed skin looks clarified.-92% agreed skin felt softer.-88% agreed skin feels more hydrated..In a study with 21 panelists, evaluated via Bio-Instrumentation (Novameter):.-After 6 hours proven to boost skin's hydration on average by +41%*....
ingredients: -Blend of Japanese Algae: Leaves skin feeling soft, comforted, and nourished..-Hyaluronic Acid: Helps skin look smooth and plump with hydration..-Tatcha's Signature Hadasei-3: Restores a visibly healthy-, youthful-looking radiance...Aqua/Water/Eau, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Propanediol, Sodium Cocoyl Glutamate, Glycerin, Acrylates Copolymer, Sodium Caproyl Methyltaurate, Coco-Betaine, Parfum/Fragrance, Saccharomyces/Camellia Sinensis Leaf/Cladosiphon Okamuranus/Rice Ferment Filtrate*, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Powder, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Betaphycus Gelatinum Extract, Lauryl Glucoside, Potassium Hydroxide, Polyquaternium-39, Disodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Carbonate, Alcohol...*Hadasei-3.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Begin with wet hands and wet face..-Squeeze a small amount into palms and rub together to create a creamy foam..-Gently massage the face and rinse thoroughly..-Can be used daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I found this facewash after my beloved face wash from estee lauder was discontinued. I was worried because I liked my previous one so much that I wouldn't find one that measured up. All I can say is wow. Not only is it just as good, it is better. Safe to say I will be incorporating this as my new daily face wash. It is an experience in and of itself. The smell is AMAZING, complex and luxurious. The lather is rich and generous. One thing I would note as a piece of advice that I had to learn from other reviews, it comes out somewhat textured/grainy like a mild physical exfoliant. If you DONT want that, you need to rub it together in your hands first (wet hands) and after a few seconds, it will melt down to be texture-free. I use chemical exfoliants and therefore dont want any kind of physical texture on my face. This is very easily solvable by rubbing the facewash in your wet hands for a few seconds. On the flip side, if you DID want the texture, just put it on straight to your face and skip that step. All in all, 10 out of 10! It's the best face wash I have ever used. I love that it's cream based, as someone with drier skin I don't do well with gel cleansers so would def recommend this for drier skinned girlies although I feel it is universal enough for all skin types.

reviews.review_text: As with the Dewy Skin Cream, I had been eyeing this for a long time since it came out but already had a cleaning routine that was working for me so I did not want to jinx it. I ended up getting a bunch of Tatcha sample size products and when my husband and I went on a work related trip, I ended up putting together bags of travel size products for us because I was so tired of lugging around my entire skincare and makeup collection when I could definitely just survive a few days without the products. My husband said he had packed my regular three skin cleansing products but turns out he didn't so I was glad to have packed the samples of this. As soon as I squeezed the bottle and I rubbed the product on my fingers to get it worked up and spread out, I knew I was going to love it. The very slight exfoliatant vibe this gives off is literal perfection - enough that you're going to notice a difference but not enough to damage your skin long term - as you rub it on your face, you are able to feel the particles dissipate and it turn into a smooth cream texture. I absolutely love the smell but I get how it could be overbearing for some so keep this is mind. The product rinses off very easily and I noticed a difference in how smooth, hydrated and more bright my cheek areas were naturally after using this. I was absolutely shocked and I am pretty sure that this will now be a product I forever repurchase, its just so worth it!
